recipes

Logarithmic Transformation

step_log creates a specification of a recipe step that will log transform data.

step_log(recipe, terms, role = NA, trained = FALSE, base = exp(1),
  vars = NULL)

Arguments

recipe
A recipe object. The step will be added to the sequence of operations for this recipe.
terms
A formula that represents the variables or terms that will be processed. The raw variable names can be used or dplyr selection tools. See selections for more details.
role
Not used by this step since no new variables are created.
trained
A logical to indicate if the quantities for preprocessing have been estimated.
base
A numeric value for the base.
vars
A character string of variable names that will be (eventually) populated by the terms argument.

Value

step_log returns an object of class step_log.

Examples

set.seed(313)
examples <- matrix(exp(rnorm(40)), ncol = 2)
examples <- as.data.frame(examples)

rec <- recipe(~ V1 + V2, data = examples)

library(magrittr)
log_trans <- rec  %>%
  step_log(terms = ~ is_predictor())

log_obj <- learn(log_trans, training = examples)
#> step 1 log training 

transformed_te <- process(log_obj, examples)
plot(examples$V1, transformed_te$V1)
